Worker Dataset

bra_hrmis_worker.Rd

This dataset contains demographic and employment information for workers, including identifiers, education, tribal/racial classification, employment status, and geographic context. Each row represents a unique worker record.

Usage

bra_hrmis_worker

Format

A data frame with N rows and 9 variables:

worker_id

Unique identifier for the worker

birth_date

Worker’s date of birth

gender

Worker’s gender

educat7

Education level using 7-category classification

tribe

Tribal affiliation (where applicable)

race

Racial/ethnic classification

status

Current employment status (active/retired)

country_code

Official World Bank ISO-3 country code

ref_date

Timestamp for the worker record
